summary: Employee Dashboard redesign features tested - All new features working correctly. Speed dial counter animation, sidebar/mobile navigation, glass-morphism design, filter pills, payment methods display, and logout button all verified. Employment Contract upload field present in onboarding Step 5. Footer scroll-to-top working.
passed_tests: Backend: 17/17 tests passed - employee auth, dashboard API, advances API, transactions API, KYC upload, utility endpoints
Frontend: Employee Dashboard - SpeedDialCounter animation displays 'Available Ksh 30,000 of Ksh 50,000' with animated circular progress
Frontend: Employee Dashboard - Sidebar navigation works (Dashboard, Request Advance, Transaction History, Documents & KYC, Settings)
Frontend: Employee Dashboard - Quick stats grid shows Earned Wages, Next Payday, Withdrawn, Employer
Frontend: Mobile Dashboard - Bottom navigation visible (Home, Advance, History, Profile icons)
Frontend: Request Advance page - Shows 'Account Not Verified' message (expected for demo employee with KYC status 'submitted')
Frontend: Transactions page - Filter pills (All, Pending, Completed, Failed) present and clickable
Frontend: Transactions page - Stats cards showing 'This Month' and 'Transactions' counts
Frontend: Settings page - Profile card with user avatar, name, company, verification badge
Frontend: Settings page - Contact info displayed (email, phone)
Frontend: Settings page - Payment Methods section showing Mobile Money (M-PESA) and Bank Account (KCB) with Active badges
Frontend: Settings page - Security section (Change Password, Biometric Login toggle)
Frontend: Settings page - Preferences section (Push Notifications toggle, Appearance/Theme)
Frontend: Settings page - Logout button works - redirects to /login after clicking
Frontend: Onboarding Step 5 (Employment Details) - Employment Contract upload field present with testId='upload-employment-contract'
Frontend: Footer scroll-to-top - Page scrolls from 6763 to 4 (top) when clicking footer links
critical_code_review_comments: Good: SpeedDialCounter component uses requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation
Good: CircularProgress in Request Advance uses SVG with gradient and strokeDasharray for smooth progress indicator
Good: All pages have consistent glass-morphism design with backdrop-blur-xl and semi-transparent backgrounds
Good: Mobile-first responsive design with BottomNav component for mobile and Sidebar for desktop
Good: All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Good: Employment Contract field properly integrated in backend model and KYC upload handler
Good: Footer handleLinkClick function correctly scrolls to top and navigates
context_for_next_testing_agent: Employee dashboard has been fully redesigned with glass-morphism theme. SpeedDialCounter shows available amount with animated circular progress. Demo employee KYC status is 'submitted' so Request Advance shows 'Account Not Verified' which is expected. Employment Contract upload is in onboarding Step 5 (case 5 in Onboarding.jsx). All 4 employee dashboard pages tested: Dashboard, RequestAdvance, Transactions, Settings.

mocked_features.mobile_money_disbursement: MOCKED - M-PESA, MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money APIs not integrated

speed_dial_counter.animation: Uses requestAnimationFrame with ease-out-cubic easing, 1500ms duration
speed_dial_counter.display: Shows 'Available' amount with circular progress and needle indicator

sidebar_navigation.features: Theme toggle, logout button, user info display
